name: today
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool uncovered_treasure.
Tool description: The Uncovered Treasure API has more than 25,000 revealed truths from every Book and chapter in the Bible as recorded by Phil Largent over the last 25 years.
API description: Fetches the treasure of the day from the Uncovered Treasure API.

callback.description: Optional JSONP callback for the request. Defaults to None.
